# Upcoming changes

This is the list of upcoming changes to Catalog APIs.

## OpenSearch interface error handling update

Please be informed that the **OData API** interface will be updated soon. The exact date of the update will be announced in a separate release note no later than 5 days before the scheduled change.

To comply with the OData PRIP interfaces, the API response for a single product query will be updated. The response will now return the product itself instead of a list containing the product (assigned to the field `value`). The example reflecting the change is presented below:

### OData request example

::: {.panel-tabset}

# HTTP Request
[`https://datahub.creodias.eu/odata/v1/Products(f5439b10-deb4-420e-9b84-146035fbb16c)`](<https://datahub.creodias.eu/odata/v1/Products(f5439b10-deb4-420e-9b84-146035fbb16c)>){target="_blank"}

:::
